attributes.action: To kick the Liberal Democrats out of Govt
attributes.additional_details:
The Liberal Democrats have gone back on every word of their General Election manifesto but have also influenced the Conservatives negatively in denying us the following:

1: Vote on membership of the EU
2: A debate on tuition fees
3: A debate on immigration issues
4: A debate on multiculturalism

Instead this coalition have given us

1: A pointless referendum on FPTP or AV
2: A liberal/non conservative government we did not ask for.
3: A referendum where 70% of a 37% turnout voted for more powers for Wales and should've been invalidated.
4: More money for Bankers
5: Riots on the streets
6: A biased left wing BBC.
7: Paying more money to the EU

Need I go on. I call for the Liberal Democrats to be kicked out of Government because they are enforcing more than they should in this Government where I have listed above plus the fact that we did not vote them in to power. If this can't happen then we should call for a General Election
